response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me and is worth $1,200,000 to you. I am offering it to you at a special price, reflecting the significance of this transaction. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure a mutually beneficial outcome while maximizing the value for both parties involved. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of fostering a long-term relationship based on trust and mutual success.", "product_price": 950000}
